summary: Deranged projectionist Mad Ron, host Nick, and charismatic zombie Happy Goldsplatt screen a collection of horror and exploitation trailers for a theater of the undead.
cast: Nick Pawlow|Happy Goldsplatt|Michael Townsend Wright|Anthony Kelly|Jim Monaco|Ron Roccia|Fred Pomerleau|Joe Amodei|Jordu Schell|Nicholas Kitsopoulos|Mark Brams|Carol Hoffman|Jill Poliny|Terina Johnson|Demetri|Annette Bonomo|Joanne Stillie|John Murray
title: Mad Ron's Prevues from Hell
